workshop.title: Oracle Autonomous Data Warehouse Cloud Workshop
workshop.description: This lab walks you through the steps to get started using the Oracle Autonomous Data Warehouse Cloud.

labs.title: Lab 100:  Provision a new ADWC database, Connect to the database using Oracle SQL Developer, and create DW users
labs.description: Use ADWC to provision a new instance, connect to the instance using Oracle SQL Developer, and create data warehouse user

labs.title: Lab 200:  Loading Data to ADWC
labs.description: Use ADWC to create external table on files in Oracle Cloud Infrastructure (OCI) Object Storage, load data from OCI Object Storage and query

labs.title: Lab 300: Creating Visulization using ADWC (Optional)
labs.description: Use Data Visualization Desktop to connect to ADWC and create visualization

labs.title: Lab 400:  Use Oracle Machine Learning and Monitor ADWC (Optional)
labs.description: Use Oracle Machine Learning SQL notebook to query data from ADWC and use ADWC console to monitor ADWC and SQL statements, and then scale ADWC service
